name: com.axit.assetloader
description: AXit Asset Loader is a Unity package designed to streamline the management and loading of game assets. It provides a flexible system for loading and unloading assets, supporting both Addressables and traditional Resource loading methods. The package is structured with a modular design that allows easy integration into Unity projects, enabling efficient asset management across various use cases. This tool is ideal for developers looking to implement a scalable asset loading system with support for both synchronous and asynchronous operations.
